gov.nih.nci.hl7.ui.dragdrop
Interface HL7SDKDropCompatibleComponent

All Known Implementing Classes:
CSVTreeDropTransferHandler, MiddlePanelJGraphDropTargetHandler, TargetTreeDropTransferHandler, TreeDefaultDropTransferHandler
public interface HL7SDKDropCompatibleComponent

This interface defines functionality that should be implemented in the class that would support drop function. These functions will give access to DropTargetAdapter for confirming drop action, updating status, etc..

Version:
Since caAdapter v1.2 revision $Revision: 1.1 $ date $Date: 2006-10-03 17:36:03 $
Author:
OWNER: Scott Jiang, LAST UPDATE $Author: marwahah $

setInDragDropMode

void setInDragDropMode(boolean flag)
Because when a drag is over a component, a selection listener would be notified as if there were an item being selected. These two function will allow DropTargetAdapter to notify the selection listener(s) of the drop target component if the drag comes or the actual selection occurs.

isInDragDropMode

boolean isInDragDropMode()
Answers if current component is under dragging mode.

Returns:
if current component is under dragging mode.

getDropTargetAdapter

HL7SDKDropTargetAdapter getDropTargetAdapter()
Return the drop target adapter.

Returns:
the drop target adapter.
